title: Steph Claire Smith stuns in a white mini dress, putting on a leggy display during her hens party
text:
She's one of the most successful fitness stars who engaged her long-time boyfriend Josh Miller in November last year.

And on Saturday, Steph Claire Smith appeared happier than ever as she celebrated her Vegas themed hens party in Melbourne.

The 25-year-old fitness model turned heads in a white mini dress and veil, treating fans to her toned physique.

It's party time! Model Steph Claire Smith (left) stunned in a white mini dress, putting on a leggy display as she celebrated her hens party with a friend on Saturday

The fitness guru stunned in little makeup, wearing light foundation with a hint of bronzer.

She completed her look with a black sash with the word Bride written across it along with a wedding garter on her toned pins.

The blonde took to her Instagram following the celebrations, sharing a series of photos alongside her influencer friends, including Big Brother star Tully Smyth.

Girl's Day Out: Steph took to her Instagram following the celebrations, sharing a series of photos alongside her influencer friends, including Big Brother star Tully Smyth (right)

Celebrations! Another, a photo alongside two females dressed up in racy red outfits, with the inside of the house decked out with red, black and white balloons and a red carpet

In one snap, Steph is seen sticking up her middle finger while posing with a female friend, wearing a fluffy scarf around her neck and black wig.

Another, a photo alongside two females dressed up as showgirls in racy red outfits.

Sticking true the Vegas theme, the inside of the house decked out with red, black and white balloons, deck cards and a red carpet.

Vegas theme! Steph and her friends were all dressed up to celebrate her hens party

The celebrations included several platters of meat and cheese for the girls to snack on throughout the day.

'The bestest bridal party a girl could ask for! Thanks for the best night ever girls,' she captioned the carousel of images.

The golden blonde and her friends were quick to share a collection of photos of their celebrations along with the hashtag #scshens.

What a feast! The house party included several platters of meat and cheese for the girls to snack on throughout the day

In one snap, Steph is seen lifting up her veil as her female friend gives her a peck.

Sharing the moment on Instagram, she captioned the snap: 'You may now kiss the Bride! Such a FUN time celebrating you & your love @stephclairesmith.'

You may now kiss the Bride! 'Such a FUN time celebrating you & your love,' a friend captioned a snap alongside Sam, along with the hashtags: #scshens #vegas

The fitness expert announced she was getting engaged to her long-time boyfriend Josh Miller in a sweet Instagram post in November last year.

At the time, the bestselling author captioned a photo of Josh's romantic proposal: 'The love of my life... my crush I've had since I was 12 years old... proposed to me in my favourite place in the whole entire world.

She continued: 'He planned a whole engagement weekend with all of my closest friends and family and it has been the best weekend of my life... I am so excited for this new chapter with you, my love.'
description: She's one of the most successful fitness stars who engaged her long-time boyfriend Josh Miller in November last year.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
